profileText: A Representative from Ohio; born in Hamilton, Butler County, Ohio, June 21, 1906; graduated from St. Xavier High School; attended Notre Dame University, South Bend, Ind.; Ph.D., Xavier University, Cincinnati, Ohio, 1928; J.D., University of Cincinnati, Cincinnati, Ohio, 1932; lawyer, private practice; elected as a Democrat to the Seventy-seventh Congress (January 3, 1941-January 3, 1943); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the Seventy-eighth Congress in 1942; United States Navy, 1943-1946; delegate, Democratic National Conventions, 1948 and 1960; chairman, Butler County Democratic Executive Committee, 1950-1966; died on September 4, 1992, in Hamilton, Ohio; interment in St. Stephen's Mausoleum, Hamilton, Ohio.
